front.title: AI Agents for 6G Requirements and Implementation Approaches

abstract.t: This document provides requirements for 3GPP Artificial Intelligence/ Machine Learning (AI/ML) Agents for the 6th generation mobile network, or 6G. Requirements depend on the types and application areas of agents. We describe each type and state their requirements. AI Agent implementation efforts, how APIs can be discovered, how inter-domain and intra domain AI Agents can be discovered using DNS lookup are explained.
